label: A2B2C_oP20_19_2a_2a_a-001
title: W\"{u}lfingite ($\epsilon$-Zn(OH)$_{2}$, C31) Structure
comments:
(Corey, 1933) originally determined the structure of $\epsilon$-Zn(OH)$_{2}$, but they were unable to locate the hydrogen atoms.  This structure was given the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $C31$ by (Gottfried, 1937). 
 (Stahl, 1998) located the hydrogen atoms, and found that they did not change the space group, so we use the updated structure as our $C31$ prototype.
